Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlayer
    An AI player class that extends the regular player class
    City
    City class that specifies the name of the city as well as aspcets of the container object used for rendering and interface
    Client
    The main client class
    ClientInstance
    The client instance class which initialises and manages the socket connection to the server
    Container
    The container class that many objects extend, it contains variables for postion, rotation, achoring and texturing as well as a list of child containers that are connected to it
    Game  
    GameManager
    Game manager class, extends the thread class to make it a runnable object
    Interface  
    JoinScreen
    Main join screen class that extends the container class
    mainGame
    Main game class that initialises and runs everything
    Map
    The map class that contains data on the locations of cites and the connections between them
    myKeyListener
    Keyboard listener class that checks what keys from the keyboard are being pressed.
    myMouseListener
    Mouse listener class that checks which mouse buttons are being clicked or held and sets the appropriate flags
    Player
    Player class that contains information on the players name, colour, score, hand, routes, the number of trains they have, whether they're connected and whether they're human or AI
    PlayerHand
    Player hand class that stores a list of train cards as well as a function to correctly render the players hand to the game screen
    Renderer
    The renderer class that containes informtion about the current rendering environment, manages drawing objects to the current window
    Route
    Route class that stores: -The two city objects to be connected -The number of segments in the route -The colour of the route -Who the route is claimed by, null by default -Whether the route arc should be flipped -The lateral offset of the route
    RouteCard
    A route card object that stores two city names and the score gained for connecting those two cities
    Server
    Main server class that extends the thread class to make it a runnable object
    Server.InputManager
    Input manager class that can process updates from the command line
    ServerScreen
    Main server screen class that extends the container class
    TextField
    A basic text rendering class that extends the container class
    TrainCard
    Simple class for train cards that specifies the colour of the train card
    UIButton
    The button class that extends the container
    UITextInput
    Text input class that extends the container class, allows the user to input text via the keyboard
